      • loadSettingsFromDefaults

      • loadSettingsFromFile

        private void loadSettingsFromFile(Context ctx)
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  JSONException
        Loads settings from file in internal storage.
        Parameters:
        ctx - activity context
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - raises when file is not found or damaged
        JSONException - raises when data are corrupted

      • saveSettings

        public boolean saveSettings(Context ctx)
        Save default settings to file.
        Parameters:
        ctx - activity context
        Returns:
        true on success, error on fail

      • setTemplateCreateCounter

        Sets number of samples needed to create template.

        count - number of samples

      • setTemplateHoldCounter

        public void setTemplateHoldCounter(int count)
                            throws HoldCounterException
        Sets maximum number of samples used to template.
        Parameters:
        count - number of samples
        Throws:
        HoldCounterException - raises when less than create counter

        Forbid external saving.

        public int getTemplateHoldCounter()
        Returns number of samples hold in template.
        Returns:
        maximum samples in one template

      • checkExternalSaving

        public boolean checkExternalSaving()
        Returns boolean, true if external saving is allowed, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if allowed, otherwise false

      • getEvaluationAlgorithm

        public int getEvaluationAlgorithm()
        Returns evaluation algorithm which is actually set as constant integer.
        Returns:
        evaluation algorithm constant

      • setEvaluationAlgorithm

        public void setEvaluationAlgorithm(int algorithm)
        Sets algorithm used to evaluate user.
        Parameters:
        algorithm - constant for algorithm (constants are found in UserLoggerManager class)

      • getSensitivity

        public double getSensitivity()
        Returns actual sensitivity level.
        Returns:
        sensitivity level

      • setSensitivity

        public void setSensitivity(double value)
        Sets sensitivity for actual evaluation algorithm. Sensitivity will be set in range <0.25, 1>.
        Parameters:
        value - sensitivity level

      • getFlag

        public int getFlag()
        Returns actual flag. Flag describes which metrics will be evaluated.
        Returns:
        actual flag.

      • setFlag

        public void setFlag(int value)
        Sets flag used for evaluation process. Flag describes which metrics will be evaluated.
        Parameters:
        value - new flag value

      • getGraphs

        public int getGraphs()
        Returns actual n-graph count.
        Returns:
        n-graphs count

      • setGraphs

        public void setGraphs(int value)
        Sets number of n-graphs.
        Parameters:
        value - number of n-graphs

      • getThresholdP

        public double getThresholdP()
        Returns actual P-threshold.
        Returns:
        p-threshold

      • setThresholdP

        public void setThresholdP(double value)
        Sets P-threshold used in T-tests. P-threshold will be set in range <0, 0.5>.
        Parameters:
        value - new threshold value
